dsc.head: Item Listing
dsc.p: These scrapbooks are also on microfilm (M-1708-1710). The letters listed are in the approximate order in which they appear in the scrapbook.

did.unittitle: Scrapbook 1, 1904-1909

scopecontent.p: Clippings, re: James Branch Cabelland his works, chiefly reviews of his early books, with some letters, listed below; 60 pp.
